title: The ultimate phone system for small and large business.
paragraph: The only virtual cloud phone system with a rich set of features that meet your business needs. Fast, affordable, scalable, and suitable for all businesses, irrespective of their size.

list.title: Workplace
list.text: A feature-packed dashboard where contacts & conversations are easy to find and features in the workspace easy to navigate.

list.title: Team
list.text: Invite contacts, create your team, assign them numbers, schedule meetings with them, and monitor them in real-time without a hassle.

list.title: Int'l Numbers
list.text: Expand your business worldwide and earn trust from overseas prospects with an international number. Getting Int’l numbers is fast & easy with KrispCall.

list.title: Business Hours
list.text: Define your business hours to get your calls automatically routed to voicemail or another destination during non-business hours.

list.title: Call Recording
list.text: Record the calls from your clients to hear about their requirements & feedbacks and finally deliver what they precisely wanted.

list.title: Internal Call/Extensions
list.text: No hassle of remembering phone numbers and extensions. You can connect with your colleagues easily through their names.

list.title: Toll Free Numbers
list.text: Use international toll-free numbers to provide toll-free calling between countries, so your global clients can reach you at no expense.

title: Call features
paragraph: Access advanced call management, call routing, and analytics solutions with our top-end features.

list.title: Global Calling
list.text: Expand your customer base worldwide with our global calling features for making instant calls across borders.

list.title: Calls on Hold
list.text: Keep the calls on hold to get further support/assistance for the clients whenever necessary, without losing their calls.

list.title: Call Transfer
list.text: Instantly route customer calls to another line or agent who can better deal with their queries. Don’t keep your clients waiting.

list.title: Call History
list.text: View the entire conversation history, incoming and outgoing call logs, and messages in one unified dashboard.

list.title: Call Filters
list.text: Narrow down the call logs with our call filters. Efficiently screen through your incoming, outgoing, and missed calls.

list.title: Call Recording
list.text: Record calls to monitor client requests and team performance. Use recorded calls as a guide for improving customer service and employee training.

list.title: Call Monitoring
list.text: Use our call monitoring feature and listen to phone calls in real-time for giving training and feedback to your team.

list.title: Caller ID
list.text: Set location-based caller IDs for outbound international calls. Localize your number to improve the chances of reaching potential customers in new markets.

list.title: DND mode for Agents
list.text: Switch to the Do Not Disturb mode and automatically shift incoming calls to voicemails to increase your focus on the work at hand.

list.title: Contact Tags
list.text: Sort clients and teams using the contact tags feature. Tag contacts to customize your dashboard for better navigation.

list.title: Voicemail
list.text: Don’t lose touch with your clients when you are unavailable. Allow clients to drop you a voicemail so their queries never go missing.

list.title: Voicemail Drop
list.text: Our voicemail drop option provides your clients the flexibility to drop you a voicemail instead of calling you, based on their preference.

title: Intelligent call routing
paragraph: Automate tedious call handling processes with KrispCall's intelligent call routing features. Save employee and customers' time for happier teams and clients.

list.title: Forward to Cell Phones and Landlines
list.text: Instantly route business calls to your cellphones and landlines whenever necessary. Make sure you are not missing out on clients when not in the office.

list.title: Call to ideal team
list.text: Reduce call processing times for your clients. Use our IVR and call sequencing function to ensure calls are directed to most ideal team members.

list.title: Custom Greeting
list.text: Enhance the calling experience for your clients. Record personalized greeting messages, so your customers feel comfortable during calls.

list.title: Business Hours
list.text: Never miss a client call. Automate call routing to pre-selected locations, so customer calls are automatically routed to offices that are open.

list.title: Power Dialer
list.text: Use our power dialer to speed up sales calls. KrispCall’s power dialer lets you immediately move to the next call in the list, saving you the time to dial numbers.

title: SMS Features
paragraph: Get in touch with your customers through texts and messaging. Carry out mass-advertising campaigns with KrispCall’s hassle-free texting solutions and improve your brand awareness.

list.title: SMS
list.text: Ensure faster response by receiving and sending personalized text messages to your clients and customers.

list.title: Bulk SMS
list.text: Use our bulk SMS feature to broadcast messages and updates to a large group of customers within seconds. Extend reach of your mass marketing campaigns.

list.title: Conversation PIN
list.text: Conversation pins help you see high priority texts at the top of your chat box. Pin important conversations for easy access and faster response.

list.title: Message Filter
list.text: Filter your text messages using our message filter option. Message filter helps you screen important messages that require immediate action.

list.title: SMS BOT
list.text: Automate your customer support using an SMS Bot. Our SMS Bot helps you efficiently answer customer queries and improves response time.

list.title: Speech to text
list.text: For faster texting, use our speech-to-text feature. KrispCall lets you transcribe your audio into text with high accuracy.

list.title: Message PIN
list.text: Pin important messages so you can access them easily when required. Pinning messages help you and your team identify valuable information during client interactions.

list.title: Message Starred
list.text: Use our message star feature to bookmark important messages so you can instantly access them when required.

title: Admin Features
paragraph: KrispCall’s admin features allow the admins to manage and customize their workspace with different options for adding team members, forming groups, importing contacts, and viewing team activity.

list.title: Access Levels - Members
list.text: Customize the level of access your team members get with KrispCall’s advanced admin features.

list.title: Members Group
list.text: Form different teams in your workspace to better segment and manage operations. Send invitations, add or remove teams, and control activity of the member group with KrispCall.

list.title: Developer API
list.text: Use our feature rich API for developers. Customize your workspace to suit your business needs with KrispCall’s developer API.

list.title: Integrations
list.text: Integrate your KrispCall workspace with third-party CRM systems to gain powerful insights with customer data analytics.

list.title: Android and iOS Apps
list.text: KrispCall app is available for both Android and iOS systems. Our easy-to-use mobile app makes working on mobile phones simple and hassle-free.

list.title: Windows, Mac and Linux Apps
list.text: KrispCall runs smoothly on Windows, Mac, and Linux. Get the best user experience with KrispCall’s desktop app.

list.title: Google Chrome Extension
list.text: With KrispCall’s Google Chrome extension, you can easily switch to your workspace for making calls.

list.title: Cloud Telephony
list.text: Move your phone system to the cloud with KrispCall’s cloud telephony. Set up a unified communication system with top-line business features using KrispCall.

list.title: Call Center Software
list.text: Minimize your call center overheads with KrispCall’s low-cost and customizable call center software. Get a premium calling experience with our feature-rich platform.

list.title: Contact Center Software
list.text: Set up a virtual contact center and elevate your customer service with KrispCall. Simplify multi-channel communication with customers using our solution.

list.title: Sales Dialer
list.text: Speed up sales calls with KrispCall’s sales dialer tool. Automate and manage call dialing processes to connect with leads and raise your team productivity.

list.title: Sales Automation
list.text: Enhance your sales metrics and sales team efficiency using KrispCall’s sales automation. Automate call routing and sales processes for higher lead conversions.

list.title: CRM Phone System
list.text: Integrate your existing CRM systems with KrispCall to keep track of your team and customer activity. Improve customer satisfaction with our advanced call analytics.

list.title: Capture Leads on Website
list.text: Convert website visitors to potential clients using KrispCall’s click-to-call widget. Drive lead conversion process with one-click calling and 30 seconds callback features.

list.title: Sales Calls from Website
list.text: Receive sales calls from your website with our click-to-call widget. Seamlessly connects potential clients to your sales team with a personalized KrispCall widget.
